message.name: VISUAL_LOCATION
message.field: X Position of the landing target on NED_FRAME
Y Position of the landing target on NED_FRAME
Z Position of the landing target on NED_FRAME
roll of the landing target on NED_FRAME
pitch of the landing target on NED_FRAME
yaw of the landing target on NED_FRAME

message.name: MARKER_LOCATION
message.field: Timestamp (UNIX Epoch time or time since system boot). The receiving end can infer timestamp format (since 1.1.1970 or since system boot) by checking for the magnitude the number.
X Position of the marker location on NED_FRAME
Y Position of the marker location on NED_FRAME
Z Position of the marker location on NED_FRAME
roll of the marker location on NED_FRAME
pitch of the marker location on NED_FRAME
yaw of the marker location on NED_FRAME
